title: ICE: called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: "read_option: expected 0 for None or 1 for Some"

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:

armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf release: 1.53.0-nightly LLVM version: 12.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: "read_option: expected 0
